meanings.definition: Consisting of or having two nuclei.
meanings.sent1: The binuclear cell divided into two smaller cells.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the binuclear structure under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The binuclear organism was so unique, it caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: The binuclear bond between the two atoms was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The binuclear star system fascinated astronomers with its dual cores.

meanings.sent1: The binuclear molecule reacted differently than expected.
meanings.sent2: The binuclear compound displayed interesting properties in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The binuclear puzzle was challenging to solve with its two separate sections.
meanings.sent4: The binuclear structure of the building made it stand out in the city skyline.
meanings.sent5: The binuclear engine design improved efficiency by utilizing dual power sources.
